attributes.action: send all illegal immigrants to their country's embassy until they can be removed from the UK by their embassy
attributes.additional_details:
Once established that a person is in the UK illegally,  make them the responsibility of their country's embassy. This should only be done when a person has come from a politically stable country, and when they have bypassed other stable countries to reach the UK.

By using court orders to prevent an illegal immigrant from leaving their embassy apart from when being escorted to a plane by embassy staff, we would save money on holding people in reception centres, and from releasing people only for them to destroy their passport and/or go missing, work illegally etc.
